EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Just Go Solar; Go SunPower.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Did you know SunPower® panels have generated over 32 billion kilowatt hours? This is the equivalent to the annual energy use of 3 million households. With more people choosing to power their home with clean, renewable energy, now is a great time to make the smart choice and go solar with SunPower.
While we haven’t been able to connect over the last few days, we are still here to answer any questions you may have towards selecting the SunPower solar system that is right for you. With tax incentive opportunities, convenient financing programs and the industry’s leading solar technology, SunPower offers an array of energy solutions to get you on the road to meaningful monthly electricity savings.
Curious about SunPower’s product performance and durability? Check out our video for more information on why Not All Solar is Created Equal.
To set up a free, no-obligation appointment, please give us a call or reply to this email with a couple of times that would work best for you. We will schedule an appointment and send a confirmation to summarize the details.
Together, let’s change the way our world is powered.
Warmly, Your Solar Advisor Team 1-800-268-0331 NewSolarHome@SunPower.com
P.S. If you are no longer interested in solar power, please let us know.
